array.string: launchctl setenv SiEPIC_Tools_Lumerical_KLayout_environment True launchctl setenv PATH /Applications/Lumerical/FDTD\ Solutions/FDTD\ Solutions.app/Contents/MacOS:/Applications/Lumerical/MODE\ Solutions/MODE\ Solutions.app/Contents/MacOS:/Applications/Lumerical/DEVICE/DEVICE.app/Contents/MacOS:/Applications/Lumerical/INTERCONNECT/INTERCONNECT.app/Contents/MacOS:$PATH
